p: Recent reviews highlight some reciprocal interplays between the IRF3 and NF-kB pathways and the ISGs [ 46, 49], while previous studies have also suggested an activating effect of ISG15 on IRF3 [ 50]. We would thus propose that the global effects of PLPs on innate immune responses could result from a crosstalk and additive action of both their DUB and deISGylating activities.
